aboutSection.headline: Trusted Oyster Mushroom Cultivation, Training, & Production Center
aboutSection.description: Besides oyster mushroom cultivation, JAMUR CIKUDA also conducts cultivation training, superior seed production, and sells guaranteed mycelium baglogs, superior mushroom seeds, frozen mushroom food, dried mushrooms, mushroom powder, and mushroom capsule health supplements.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Jamur Cikuda Nusantara is a professional oyster mushroom cultivation center that provides training, superior seed sales, guaranteed baglog, and high-quality mushroom products.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What Our Customers Say
reviews.description: What our customers say about Jamur Cikuda Nusantara products and services.

review1.name: Helmy Y
review1.desc: Perhaps this is the best, neat, beautiful mushroom farm ever in Indonesia. The workers look happy and the team is very friendly. Thank you, I hope this service is continued

review2.name: Malik
review2.desc: From the beginning we received an allocation of 5 kg of fresh mushrooms, to hundreds of kg, Jamur Cikuda production mushrooms are always fresh and good. The workers are friendly and make us comfortable

review3.name: Ivome Susan
review3.desc: First company investment seems to always maintain quality and promises worth keeping. Moving money from the bank to this place made our investment multiply

faq.title: FAQ
faq.heading: Information and Q&A About Our Services
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

faq1.question: Is Jamur Cikuda company privately owned or a PT?
faq1.answer: PT Jamur Cikuda Nusantara is a limited liability company whose shares are privately owned by several people

faq2.question: What Services Are Available?
faq2.answer: Cultivation, Training, Seed Production, Baglog, Dried Mushrooms, Mushroom Powder, Mushroom Capsules, Health Mushrooms, Kumbung Construction, Mushroom Business Cooperation, Cultivation Together, etc.

faq3.question: How to contact a specific PIC for example for consultation, business cooperation or visits?

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.headline: Get to Know Us Better
aboutPage.description: Jamur Cikuda Nusantara has been established since 2016 with a focus on high-quality oyster mushroom cultivation. Starting from a hobby, we are now a center for mushroom education and production in Bogor.
aboutPage.subDescription: Get to know our journey in bringing goodness from nature through innovation, research, and high commitment to producing quality mushroom products.
aboutPage.experienceHighlight: 5 years of experience in the mushroom industry
aboutPage.experienceSuffix: , delivering quality products and trusted services.

managed.title: Managed by professionals
managed.description: Every process is carried out by an experienced team that prioritizes quality, efficiency, and customer trust.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become the largest and most trusted mushroom cultivation and development center in Indonesia.

mission.title: Mission
mission.item4: Encourage innovation in the mushroom industry
